Title: Iris and the Lieutenant
Writer: Olle Hedberg (novel), Olle Hedberg (screenplay), Alf Sjöberg
Actors: Mai Zetterling, Alf Kjellin, Åke Claesson, Holger Löwenadler
Plot: The officer Robert Motander is invited to a dinner with his upper-class relatives. During the dinner he observes the beautiful young house-maid, Iris. He suggests that the two of them go out to see a movie. This is the beginning of love story that Robert's relatives will do anything to stop. A working-class mistress will do but a working-class fiancée? Never!
